item.title: References
item.description: The combined references of the two articles (published in Psychology in Russia) Adler, P. S., & Borys, B. (1996). Two types of bureaucracy: Enabling and coercive. Administrative Science Quarterly, 41(1), 61–89. https://doi.org/10.2307/2393986 Andreas, P., & Price, R. (2001). From War Fighting to Crime Fighting: Transforming the American National Security State. International Studies Review, 3(3), 31–52. Andringa, T. C. (2015). The Psychological Drivers of Bureaucracy: Protecting the Societal Goals of an Organization.
